_sText:
Hey, it's me with anything new and soo boring - map in dust style.
I know, I know, too much of it. But that's not about it. 

**THIS MAP IS MADE IN 3 DAYS.**

I just was going to try make a test "If there is as less surf on a combat map as possible, then it's more popular" - so let's see that! :)

This map is just a test from me, so it isn't anything original.
It's mostly based on surf_dust2_2008_final, so thanks to mapper|Hetman for inspiration for me. It's about 2x bigger than the original, so it may be on bigger servers.

**The map has:**

- 60 sec bomb-planting protection,

- 8 different trail nades,

- Secret teleports (with the windows, shot it and u will be teleported. Firstly find out which window it is),

- Jail with weapons strip and deagle recieve,

- 2 bombsites,

- Buy Zone at the middle of the map,

- And of course weapons set at the whole map,

**Known bugs:**

- Lighting problems (shadows where they shouldn't supposed to be),

- It is possible to get on the "walls" of the middle map and just walk on it, but I can't fix it in 100%, because it's just good in Hammer Editor, but I made everything I could to fix it,

- bad optimalization - when looking at the whole map it drops to about 160, when just being on ramps, etc. - 300. Just didn't want to waste my time on optimalizing it, sorry. I don't know much about it.

THIS MAP PROPABLY WON'T BE EVER UPDATED.

Thanks for playing anyway.

@EDIT: Recommended RPG mod, it has been tested on RPG server and gameplay is so nice!
